attributes.class: =if([$Status] == 'Request Complete', 'ms-bgColor-greenLight', if([$Status] == 'In Progress', 'ms-bgColor-blueLight', if([$Status] == 'Equipment Checked Out', 'ms-bgColor-yellowLight', if([$Status] == 'Pending Pickup', 'ms-bgColor-orangeLight', if([$Status] == 'Delayed', 'ms-bgColor-redLight', if([$Status] == 'Blocked', 'ms-bgColor-grayLight', 'ms-bgColor-neutralLight'))))))

attributes.iconName: =if([$Status] == 'Request Complete', 'CompletedSolid', if([$Status] == 'In Progress', 'PinnedSolid', if([$Status] == 'Equipment Checked Out', 'DeliveryTruck', if([$Status] == 'Pending Pickup', 'Clock', if([$Status] == 'Delayed', 'Error', if([$Status] == 'Blocked', 'BlockedSite', 'Info'))))))
attributes.title: [$Status]
